> Perceptor Quickly freed Rodimus while he did this he asked to 
> Scourge"Why should I free you??? You're my enemy remember?"

Scourge glanced over at Cyclonus, a confused look on his face since it was Cyclonus who had spoken to Perceptor and not he. However he then turned back at Percpetor, "Because we are caught here just like your companion, captured just like him, and I want to slag the mech who did this!"

Cyclonus smiled slightly as he listened, "Perceptor, we are enemies of your enemies, we can work together in this to free ourselves."

(TAG: Perceptor)

> and lookign to Rodimus said "Where is Zarak?"

Rodimus coughed as he stumbled out of the chamber and looked around. "There!" he says as he points to a door leading to front cabin of Skorponok. "He is probrably caught like we were." Rodimus coughed again looking weak. 

> Darkfate picked up Nichtstrike and preprared to leave this place

Marauder nodded as he stepped over to a computer console. "This place is powered by theremal energy." As he depressed a few buttons the readings on the console began to change rapidly. "It is a small matter to take the coolants off line." 

After a few last commands Marauder stepped away from the console with a small smile. "In approximately 60 of this world's seconds, this base as well as the surround chamber will be reduced to molten magma!"

The computer begins a count down, even as heat readings begin to slowly climb upwards.

(TAG: Darkfate)

Preston
